content:
Can we have a Zulip stream for api-18 issues and queries, please? Here's a starter. This topic could be moved there .

Api-18 includes these extensions to the previous Get<type>GUIDArray functions

extern DECL_EXP wxArrayString GetRouteGUIDArray(OBJECT_LAYER_REQ req);
extern DECL_EXP wxArrayString GetTrackGUIDArray(OBJECT_LAYER_REQ req);
extern DECL_EXP wxArrayString GetWaypointGUIDArray(OBJECT_LAYER_REQ req);

Very welcome... but I don't think they exist in OCPN 5.7 Beta 3
This topic was moved here from #general > api-18 by Alec Leamas.

We try to avoid too many streams. One reason is that if we would create such a stream, initially no one would be listening.

We have this stream for various discussions on the current master, this is an example. So, moved it here.

Api-18 includes these extensions to the previous Get<type>GUIDArray functions [...] . but I don't think they exist in OCPN 5.7 Beta 3

That is, we need to update ocpn_plugin.h in opencpn-libs/api-18. Could you please file a bug against https://github.com/leamas/opencpn-libs/ ?

Alec Leamas said:

Api-18 includes these extensions to the previous Get<type>GUIDArray functions [...] . but I don't think they exist in OCPN 5.7 Beta 3

That is, we need to update ocpn_plugin.h in opencpn-libs/api-18. Could you please file a bug against https://github.com/leamas/opencpn-libs/ ?

They are already in ocpn_plugin.h in opencpn-libs/api-18. But not in OCPN 5.7 Beta 3

The simple thing is to file that bug. The bug is needed for two reasons:

  • I need a reminder, cannot do this right now.
  • Any change done in 3.2 needs to have bug as a reference, since we by definition only do bug fixes to the 3.2 branch

Alec Leamas said:

The simple thing is to file that bug.

I now see no action required in API-18, so no need to raise an issue, I think. It just needs progress with this issue raised against OCPN. I have just noticed there was an unanswered query on it that I did not feel needed answering. I have now done so - hopefully that will help it along.
